description:
Kaoru`s Inukami are infighting about their ranks. They all swarm to Keita to get him to proclaim who is Number One, but things turn sideways when a vase that grants any wish in the most literal fashion possible is thrown into the mix.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: That`s Just What Mokkori Keita Wants!
もっこり啓太の思うツボっ!
